title: Analysis on Mind of the Virtuoso Teaser.
body:
Make sure you have watched the video before you read this. Check it out [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B4-BgDEy2AE).

First up, we can debunk the theory that he was in the Zaun gang with Ekko, Jinx and Vi. 

1. First his concept seems a bit too mystical for Zaun. 

2. This picture [here](http://i.imgur.com/Fu8N7ei.jpg), shows the symbol on his gun. It is 4 lines downwards, reminiscent of ancient greek symbolism. If he was part of the gang this would surely be a roman numeral, like we had for Ekko.

Ok so now that we have that out of the way, lets look into the core of this analysis:

_Re-watch the teaser and you'll see that each movement represents a different element._

1. The first is fire. 
 http://i.imgur.com/hgefObE.jpg

2. The second is water.
 http://i.imgur.com/KuUXcdw.jpg

3. The third is air. 
 http://i.imgur.com/tP7Idai.jpg

4. The fourth is earth.
 http://i.imgur.com/bpNE6dP.jpg

Each of these elements matches a teaser we got.

+ Zed: Earth.
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n_QLf7u5Urk/Vn80n6Vdj1I/AAAAAAAA2Vc/eWRWzghzRU0/s1600/J7TUHek%2B%25281%2529.jpg

+ Sona: Air.
 http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HVMJ6VUUGKQ/VoG1d7t-6nI/AAAAAAAA2W8/N2IWF2Xbw8E/s1600/sn.jpg

+ Garen: Water
 http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SlHvPVSacbY/VoRacyeqTYI/AAAAAAAA2Xk/1_jj29gWPe8/s1600/garen.jpg

+ Vi: Fire
  http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Acynvt18Xpo/VocRqsRA4II/AAAAAAAA2Yk/f-B8HVhNKmw/s1600/vvv4.jpg

Another interesting point is that these teasers were released in the exact opposite order to how they appeared in the Mind of the Virtuoso.

Now the obvious and speculation stuff:

1. He/She is an ADC. The prominent use of guns confirms this.

2. Jhin is a female. This one is speculation, but if you look at Jhin's eye at about [1:00](https://youtu.be/B4-BgDEy2AE?t=1m), the eyelashes are extremely feminine in my opinion.

3. It's likely at this point that each element relates to one of his/her abilities. 4 elements, 4 abilities, seems logical.

If I missed anything, or something has come up since I posted this, please tell me.

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QaEejn38,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T22:30:23.846+0000)
>
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

The moment I saw this thread, I was ready to bet that a comment from Marauduau would have the 'zombie slayer Panth munching on popcorn' sticker, taunting our faces.
too true
pretty sure 99% of his posts in regards to teasers have that
This thing becoming avatar man. Jhin the master of all 4 elements xD
You know me well {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
It's been confirmed Jhin is a male I'm pretty sure...

I assume you are referring to [this](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3zr8pv/mind_of_the_virtuoso/cyocqq1)? 

It's definitely solid evidence against my claim, but it's something is still a miss. The eyelashes and first breath in the teaser are overwhelmingly feminine. Some are saying it's a possibility he is a gay champion?

You make me laugh, male and female eyelashes have a usually grow to the same length and thickness, Mascara is normally the only thing that defines feminine in regards to eyelashes. Its a male, with Normal eyelashes. Gay people also have Normal eyelashes unless they are wearing mascara, which most of the time they dont. 
Believe me i know from experience, hun.
Yeah of course. I'm just saying that the eyelashes have been displayed as longer than usual too look more feminine, Riot often places little bits of symbolism in all their teasers.
That hardly counts as symbolism. Jhin is more than likely male, I'm pretty positive the name is even considered masculine.
Looks like I was incorrect actually. There's strong evidence suggesting that Riot brought attention to that eye as symbolism to what happened to his other eye, and how he holds the his gun.
Abilities have a blind, a silence, some armor pen, and a DOT maybe? Relating it to the pics of zed sona garen and vi
uhhh, thats lucians cult symbol. Little thing he hung in with his wife killing stuff

Where did you find this? I only found 3 teasers that were released with solid information for Lucian: [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-preview/shadows-and-reflections), [here](http://i.imgur.com/puywRGS.jpg) and [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bgFD2ZNpfN8).

I have found proof in neither of these that confirms your statement.
good for you, it is what it is
troll?
The developer said "he is almost ready" so it's a male, also virtuoso is an italian word with used to describe talented males, the female version is virtuosa.

I made a small little theory before the teaser came out :3
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/ELgUxYam-jhindeadeyemy-theory
Your theory was right on, you should paragraph your theory-crafting though, that wall of text is a little daunting :D
sorry. Kind of new on making theories :D
nothing to do with making theories lol, its just basic layout to make it more appealing
Hope its element related, after years it will finally be a 4 element champ
I don't know if this a resemblance, but the guys at the end looks an awful lot like the guy at the start of the Project: Overdrive video. Thoughts?
Riot keep using "he" and "his" for Jhin, so if Jhin is a female, they want that to be a big surprise.

Well the only thing I could think of when the line "I will make you beautiful. I will make you perfect" was Pyg.

https://youtu.be/vXUCu3EhReY?t=1m30s
Is it just me or did they look like they had a hunchback?
its q to r i made that theory ages ago man
Yeah I think I remember reading that post, now we have very solid evidence that this may be the case. We now also know that it relates to an element for sure.
